data.message: Coca-Cola A little while ago, you included Stafford on your tour and stopped at Tesco, Stafford. The year after and up until now, you've taken it off the tour. May I ask why? Was it not busy enough?? You've alot of people in Stafford AND Cannock that would love to see it in the little town. - and don't reply with your reply of "months of planning" etc etc. I just want to know WHY it got taken off.
